original_text: The people of Israel shall pitch their tents by their companies, each man in his own camp and each man by his own standard.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손은 막사를 치되 그 진영별로 각각 그 진영과 군기 곁에 칠 것이나

sentences.original_text: The people of Israel shall pitch their tents
each man in his own camp
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람은 자기의 진영에 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and each man by his own standard
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 사람은 자기의 깃발 곁에 있을 것입니다
